TopicTitle: Quests do not show up when I am able to do them

Articles.Content: I am playing career mode and I am trying to make some money. I started doing the transmit sience form somewhere missions, but as soon as I get a sattalite or space station to the point, I am supposed to get sience from, I stop getting that mission. Is there any way to prevent this, or any other good way to make money?

Are you agreeing to perform the task before you take off? 

Also, welcome to the forum.
the problem is, that I am getting these quests again and again, but after I did it once and placed the satilite, I just dont get the mission anymore.

Sounds like bad luck. You will get the missions over and over but the more you do, the more different available missions there are so the less you see of a specific type.

Anyway "get science" missions aren't very lucrative. Take the "put a satellite here" missions they're money farms. And if you put a relay on them you're getting paid to set up a communications network.
